item.title: Strictly's Tilly Ramsay inundated with support after being 'body shamed' by radio presenter
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p><em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/strictly-come-dancing/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Strictly Come Dancing</strong></a></em> contestant <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/tilly-ramsay/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Tilly Ramsay</strong></a> has hit back at a body shamer who made a negative comment about her weight.</p> <p><strong>Exclusive: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/celebrities/20211016123997/strictly-tilly-ramsay-nikita-kuzmin-laugh-off-curse-rumours/" target="_blank" rel="">Strictly stars Tilly Ramsay and Nikita Kuzmin comment on romance rumours</a></strong></p> <p>The 19-year-old, who is the daughter of celebrity chef <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/gordon-ramsay/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Gordon Ramsay</strong></a>, was called a "chubby little thing" by LBC radio presenter Steve Allen.</p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="3ie1O24G" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/3ie1O24G-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: Tilly and Nikita share details about their Strictly experience so far</strong></p> <p>Upon hearing the audio, the TikTok star took to Instagram and urged people to be more kind. She admitted this wasn't the first time someone made jibes about her weight.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/film/20211009123396/strictly-come-dancing-tilly-ramsay-details-everything-to-know/" target="_blank" rel="">Who is Tilly Ramsay? Everything you need to know about the star</a></strong></p> <p><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/film/20211002123116/gordon-ramsay-sweet-reaction-tilly-ramsay-strictly-dance/" target="_blank" rel="">Gordon Ramsay has the best reaction to Tilly's sensational dance</a></strong></p> <p>"I try not to read and listen to comments and negativity however recently being called out on a national radio station by a 67-year-old man is a step too far," she wrote. "Steve please feel free to voice your opinions however I draw the line at commenting on my appearance.</p> <p><strong>"It's such a shame that someone is trying to make such a positive experience negative. This isn't the first and definitely won't be the last comment made about my appearance and I accept that and I'm learning to accept myself.</strong></p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="tilly-ramsay-nikita-kuzmin-dance" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/celebrities/20211020124354/strictly-tilly-ramsay-inundated-support-body-shamed-radio/0-600-408/tilly-ramsay-nikita-kuzmin-dance-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Tilly and Nikita Kuzmin are fan favourites on Strictly</strong></p> <p>"But please remember that words can hurt and at the end of the day I am only 19 and I'm so grateful for all the amazing opportunities I have been able to take part in and I understand that being in the public eye obviously comes with it's own repercussions and I've been aware of this from a young age."</p> <p>She concluded: <strong>"However I won't tolerate people that think it's okay to publicly comment and scrutinise anyone's weight and appearance. Love Tilly xx."</strong></p> <p>In the caption, she simply said: "#bekind." Fellow <em>Strictly </em>stars were quick to share their words of support, with her dance partner Nikita Kuzmin writing: "[heart emoji] #BeKind." <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/giovanni-pernice/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Giovanni Pernice</strong></a> commented: "Some people are very nasty!! Don't listen to this crap... we love You girl! #bekind."</p> <iframe width="320" height="320" frameBorder="0" src="https://www.instagram.com/p/CVPo6KOg2BC/embed" frameborder="0"></iframe> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>The TV star shared this statement on Instagram</strong></p> <p><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/janette-manrara/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Janette Manrara</strong></a> added: "#BeKind…. How fast we forget what hurtful comments can do for someone's mental health. You are a POWERFUL young lady! Wear your crown w/ your head held high." Rose Ayling-Ellis said: "You're beautiful Tilly! [heart emojis]." Ugo Monye stated: "Love ya Tilly."</p> <p>Dianne Buswell also offered her love, saying: "Tilly your a beauty inside and out . I think your so brave to speak up about this perfectly said I hope people learn from this, just know that we all support you and think your wonderful xxxx."</p> <p>Meanwhile, her sister Holly Ramsay wrote: "Very well said x #bekind [heat emojis]." Giovanna Fletcher added: "I just gasped so loudly at his comments. There are many words to use for him, however he is irrelevant and not worth it. YOU are sunshine. YOU are welcoming, bubbly, fun, kind, sweet, and endearing. YOU are beautiful from your head to your toes and the inside out. Keep doing you! Xxxx."</p> <p><em><strong>Make sure you never miss a ROYAL story! <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/newsletter/?utm_source=article&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=newsletter-signup" target="_blank" rel="">Sign up to our newsletter</a> to get all of our celebrity, royal and lifestyle news delivered directly to your inbox.</strong></em></p> </body></html>
item.dc:creator: Sharnaz Shahid

item.title: Exclusive: Peter Andre admits he 'doesn't sleep' worrying about son Junior
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p dir="ltr"><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/peter-andre/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Peter Andre</strong></a> is every inch the doting dad, made evident from his public adoration for his four children Junior, 16, Princess, 14, Amelia, seven and little Theo, four. In an exclusive interview with <em><strong>HELLO!</strong></em>, Peter revealed how he handled a "bittersweet lockdown" while wife <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/emily-macdonagh/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Emily Andre</strong></a> was on the NHS frontline, and how he's teaching Junior and Princess to ignore online trolls.</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>SEE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/homes/gallery/2020041187737/peter-andre-emily-macdonagh-house-surrey-cyprus/1/" target="_blank" rel="">Inside Peter Andre's two beautiful homes in Surrey and Cyprus</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr">After working on a campaign with <a href="http://habitat.co.uk/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><strong>Habitat Kids</strong></a> that encourages parents to spend more time with their children, Peter discussed how quality family time is achieved in the Andre household. </p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="gDEFikEx" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/gDEFikEx-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: Peter Andre reveals how son Theo is taking after him in sweet video</strong></p> <p dir="ltr">"Millie sometimes says to me: 'Dad you're on your phone,' and I don't realise it, because it's such a normal part of our routine to be on our phones", explained Peter. "Even though she's younger, she knows if I'm not paying attention.</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>MORE:<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/20210711117196/peter-andre-emily-macdonagh-wedding-devon-photos/" target="_blank" rel=""> Peter and Emily Andre's romantic wedding was so regal - photos</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20210506112526/peter-andre-son-junior-doest-want-to-die-coronavirus/" target="_blank" rel="">Peter Andre's son tells fans he doesn't 'want to die' as he details health battle</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr">"I think it's incredibly important to give your children your undivided attention for your children's self-worth, for them to feel close to their family and for them to feel safe – because they feel that you're present and channelled into them."</p> <p dir="ltr"> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="peter-andre-with-junior-princess-smiling-instagram" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/mother-and-baby/20211019124296/peter-andre-worry-for-junior-and-princess-exclusive/0-600-172/peter-andre-with-junior-princess-smiling-instagram-z.jpg"> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Peter shares an incredibly close relationship with his children</strong></p> <p dir="ltr">New research from Habitat Kids showed that 20 per cent of parents report only being able to play with their kids for less than two hours a week, with work being the top reason they don’t, followed by kids preferring screen time, or wanting to play with siblings and friends over parents. <em>Read our Q&A with Peter below...</em></p> <h2 dir="ltr"><strong>How was lockdown for you as a family?</strong></h2> <p dir="ltr">"As a family, lockdown was a bittersweet situation. Emily was right on the frontline during that first lockdown before PPE was introduced. I remember her calling me one day and explaining that someone had walked in coughing, so she was going to self isolate for three days. Three days later she got so sick, and everyone in that room ended up getting COVID. So at that time I had the whole family at home, I was cooking for everyone, I was parenting, I was cleaning, I was the chef, I was doing all of it, but I loved it!</p> <p dir="ltr">"I really felt for people during that first lockdown that didn't have a garden. It was so easy for people to say "stay at home", but if you didn't have outdoor space I can't even imagine how difficult that would have been.<strong> Luckily, the weather was incredible and we were able to make the most of it together. I say to my kids we'll never forget the summer of 2020.</strong></p> <p dir="ltr"> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="peter-andre-and-wife-emily" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/mother-and-baby/20211019124296/peter-andre-worry-for-junior-and-princess-exclusive/0-600-187/peter-andre-and-wife-emily-z.jpg"> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Peter described lockdown as "bittersweet" with wife Emily on the frontline</strong></p> <p dir="ltr">"The second and third lockdown were much harder. It was cold, dark, it was depressing for the kids. Homeschooling whilst being on their screens for hours and hours with no daylight was not fun for them at all.</p> <p dir="ltr">"Plus, I then got COVID which was tough. It was a difficult time for the kids too not knowing if they would be taking their GCSE's. It was so confusing for them, but for me, as a parent, I got so incredibly close with them. Little Theo especially."</p> <h2 dir="ltr"><strong>Do you find it harder connecting with Princess and Junior now they're older and on social media?</strong></h2> <p dir="ltr">"One of the things Emily and I are adamant about is no phones at the dinner table. That time is when we sit and talk as a family. We talk about anything – it could be about what Millie did at school that day, or what Princess has got coming up, but it's that quality time that is so important to us.</p> <p><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/mother-and-baby/20210928122779/peter-andre-wife-emily-reveals-theo-saw-grease-performance/" target="_blank" rel="">Peter Andre's wife Emily melts hearts as she reveals son Theo's sweet 'first'</a></strong></p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/celebrities/20210917121971/peter-andre-thrills-fans-son-junior-being-supportive/" target="_blank" rel="">Peter Andre thrills fans with heartwarming video of 'supportive' son Junior</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr">"We also have a one screen rule which is a brilliant way to stay connected with your family. If we're watching a film, nobody else is allowed their phone. It doesn't always work admittedly, but it does mean if you're all watching something then you can enjoy it together. It encourages us to laugh and talk together.</p> <h2 dir="ltr"><strong>Do you think your children being on social media makes you more protective of them? Especially Princess?</strong></h2> <p dir="ltr">"I have joked in the past that I would never let Princess go on <em>Love Island</em>. I think it's just the image of your daughter being all grown up – it scares me! I've told her she can go on it, but only to present it. Or she can go on it if it's only nuns and priests involved!</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>"I worry about the kids a lot. Junior got his moped recently - every night I can't sleep until he's home. I just cannot sleep. It doesn't matter where I am. I cannot sleep until I know he's safe. That's just the worry of a parent.</strong></p> <p dir="ltr"><strong> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </strong></p><img alt="peter-andre-with-princess-instagram" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/mother-and-baby/20211019124296/peter-andre-worry-for-junior-and-princess-exclusive/0-600-170/peter-andre-with-princess-instagram-z.jpg"> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>The star explained his concerns for his teenage daughter facing online trolls</strong></p> <p dir="ltr">"What really concerns me about Princess and Junior being on social media is the comments.<strong> I made Princess turn off her comments for a whole year. I don't think comments should be allowed on anything.</strong></p> <p dir="ltr">"I tried to show the kids an example of people who are loved, like Prince William or David Beckham, to prove to them that even people like them get attacked online. It doesn't matter what you do, trolls will find a way to say something bad about you – and that does worry me as a parent.</p> <p dir="ltr">"One of the main things I try to teach them is not to read comments, or to just turn them off completely. You can't censor everything in life, but in my honest opinion, I think comments should be banned. It would make such a big difference because then you would just read, and talk amongst your family about things that concern you instead of leaving it online for the person it's about to analyse."</p> <p dir="ltr"><em>Peter Andre is working with Habitat to launch its first ever year-round kids’ collection, available now at Argos, <a data-saferedirecturl="https://www.google.com/url?q=http://Habitat.co.uk&source=gmail&ust=1634660522445000&usg=AFQjCNGy3KMcM-b6yOdEZVhMnNJq_HicYg" href="http://habitat.co.uk/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">Habitat.co.uk</a> and Sainsbury’s.</em></p> </body></html>
item.dc:creator: Georgia Brown

item.title: Millie Mackintosh's exquisite baby shower cake is too beautiful to eat – see photos
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p>Pregnant <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/millie-mackintosh/" target="_blank" rel="">&l t;strong>Millie Mackintosh</strong></a> has wowed her Instagram followers with photos of her baby shower cake – and it's impossible not to be impressed.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/20210623116022/millie-mackintosh-hugo-taylor-wedding-photos/" target="_blank" rel="">Millie Mackintosh and Hugo Taylor's intimate wedding photos revealed</a></strong></p> <p>The former <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/made-in-chelsea/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Made in Chelsea</strong></a> star, who shares her 17-month-old daughter Sienna with her husband Hugo Taylor, is expecting her second baby this autumn and celebrated her pregnancy with the most stunning baby shower at her London home.</p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="Xk4fpWjb" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/Xk4fpWjb-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: Millie shows off her baby shower decor</strong></p> <p>Lovely Millie shared pictures of her house decorated with a fabulous balloon display, a healthy buffet by celebrity go-to caterers <em>Grape and Fig</em>, and her super beautiful cake by the popular <em>EL&N bakery.</em></p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="millie-mackintosh-baby-shower" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/cuisine/20211020124350/millie-mackintosh-baby-shower-cake/0-600-401/millie-mackintosh-baby-shower-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Millie with her fabulous baby shower banquet</strong></p> <p>Millie wrote: "My baby shower banquet! Thank you @grapeandfig for the most delicious grazing platters that hit the spot with all my sweet and savoury pregnancy cravings. <strong>What celebration would be complete without a cake? @elan_cafe are my go to for special occasions and did not disappoint with the lightest almond and lemon cake.</strong> Thank you to everyone who came and made the day so special."</p> <p><strong>MORE:</strong> <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/cuisine/20211019124274/little-mix-leigh-anne-pinnock-secret-garden-themed-birthday-cake/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Leigh-Anne Pinnock's jaw-dropping birthday cake you might have missed</strong></a></p> <p><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/cuisine/20211018124189/princess-anne-kitchen-gatcombe-park/" target="_blank" rel="">Why Princess Anne's huge walk-in fridge at Gatcombe Park is her 'favourite place'</a></strong></p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="millie-mackintosh-cake" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/cuisine/20211020124350/millie-mackintosh-baby-shower-cake/0-600-402/millie-mackintosh-cake-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Wow, what a cake!</strong></p> <p>The stunning cake was a two-layered masterpiece, decorated with multi-coloured delicate flowers pressed into the white icing. It really does look too good to eat! We're totally here for the almond and lemon flavouring too.</p> <p>Of course, Millie's followers adored the cake just as much as we do, with one posting: <strong>"Omg this cake," and another commenting, "Beautiful, that cake is exquisite."</strong></p> <p>A third fan told the star: "Food and cake look incredible. No beige buffet for you. Now that's the sort of buffet I would always choose. And the cake is simple but extraordinary and so beautiful."</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="hugo-taylor-cake" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/cuisine/20211020124350/millie-mackintosh-baby-shower-cake/0-600-400/hugo-taylor-cake-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Millie's husband Hugo cuts the cake</strong></p> <p>In a recent interview and photoshoot with <strong>HELLO!</strong>, Millie told us: "<strong>I’ve been so busy with Sienna I haven’t had much time to focus on being pregnant. </strong>The first pregnancy, it was all I thought and talked about. But I sometimes now forget I’m pregnant – and I never thought I’d ever be someone who said that. Then I’ll catch sight of myself in the mirror and I’m like: ‘Oh, yeah! There’s a big bump!’"</p> <p>Discovering they were expecting again was a "huge surprise" to the couple, who married in a beautiful ceremony covered exclusively by <strong>HELLO! </strong>in July 2018.</p> <p>"My first thought was: ‘I already have a baby,’" she says. "But having them so close together will have its advantages and you can’t plan these things."</p> <p><em><strong>Make sure you never miss a ROYAL story! <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/newsletter/?utm_source=article&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=newsletter-signup" target="_blank" rel="">Sign up to our newsletter</a> to get all of our celebrity, royal and lifestyle news delivered directly to your inbox.</strong></em></p> </body></html>
item.dc:creator: Sophie Hamilton

item.title: Ruth Langsford's funky M&S blazer is so fashionable right now
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/ruth-langsford/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong> Ruth Langsford</strong></a> has certainly started the week in style, rocking a range of trendy outfits for her return to <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/loose-women/" target="_blank" rel=""><em><strong>Loose Women</strong></em></a>, and on Tuesday she was spotted in the colour of the moment.</p> <p><strong>RELATED: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20211013123890/ruth-langsford-unique-shirt-karen-millen-loose-women/" target="_blank" rel="">Ruth Langsford makes a statement in unique shirt - and it's so flattering</a></strong></p> <p>The presenter wore one of our favourite looks to date, with her emerald green blazer from <a href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marksandspencer.com%2F" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><strong>Marks and Spencer</strong></a> stealing the show. Ruth paired the blazer with a leopard camisole, smart black trousers and matching leopard heels, looking so chic as she strutted up and down the television studios.</p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="WS2alabX" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/WS2alabX-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: Ruth Langsford wows <em>Loose Women</em> fans in bold M&S top</strong></p> <p>Sharing the look with her loyal followers, the star wrote: "Jacket & trouser combo for @loosewomen today…Emerald Green jacket (love this colour!) by @marksandspencer Trousers @hobbslondon Animal print camisole top @mintvelvet Animal print court shoes @nextofficial (old) Styled by @mothershoppers".</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20211008123572/ruth-langsford-sparkle-blazer-qvc/" target="_blank" rel="">Ruth Langsford turns up the glam with her sparkling blazer - and fans are in love</a></strong></p> <p>Fans rushed to comment on the outfit, with one gushing: "<strong>The colour of the jacket is stunning on you</strong>," while another added: "<strong>Looking beautiful as always Ruth</strong>".</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy="Photo: © Instagram"></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="ruth-langsford-blazer" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/celebrity-style/20211020124344/ruth-langsford-marks-and-spencer-green-blazer-loose-women/0-600-375/ruth-langsford-blazer-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Ruth Langsford's followers loved her green blazer</strong></p> <p><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/eamonn-holmes/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Eamonn Holmes</strong></a>' wife wore her signature blonde bob in a sleek, straight style and sported a neutral makeup look, perfectly complementing her colourful ensemble.</p> <p>Sadly, it seems that her exact blazer is no longer available online, however, we have sourced an amazing alternative from Mango.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="mango-blazer" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/celebrity-style/20211020124344/ruth-langsford-marks-and-spencer-green-blazer-loose-women/0-600-374/mango-blazer-z.jpg"> <p itemprop="name" style="text-align:center"><strong>Double-breasted blazer, £59.99, <a class="aff_text" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&mid=36057&u1=CLT-U100--&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fshop.mango.com%2Fgb%2Fwomen%2Fjackets-and-suit-jackets-blazers%2Fdouble-breasted-blazer_17014385.html" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="green blazer">Mango</a></strong></p> <h6 itemprop="name" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&mid=36057&u1=CLT-U100--&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fshop.mango.com%2Fgb%2Fwomen%2Fjackets-and-suit-jackets-blazers%2Fdouble-breasted-blazer_17014385.html" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="green blazer">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>The jacket features a wrap detail with a double button design and a lapel style collar. It is sure to become a staple in your wardrobe this autumn, and can be paired with everything from shirts to knitwear and even mini dresses.</p> <p>Ruth has been rocking lots of fashionable high street looks on <em>Loose Women</em> lately, and yesterday the star stunned in a <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20211019124255/ruth-langsford-phase-eight-shirt-dress-loose-women/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>patterned shirt dress from Phase Eight</strong></a>.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy="Photo: © Instagram"></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="ruth-langsford-shirt-dress" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/celebrity-style/20211020124344/ruth-langsford-marks-and-spencer-green-blazer-loose-women/0-600-376/ruth-langsford-shirt-dress-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Ruth wowed <em>Loose Women </em>fans in her Phase Eight dress</strong></p> <p>The 61-year-old wowed fans in the waist-cinching number, which featured a striking camel print, long sleeves and a smart collar. Sharing the look with her million followers, Ruth wrote: "Frocked up for @loosewomen today…dress from @phaseeight Shoes @topshop (old) Styled by @mothershoppers".</p> <p>Fans loved the autumnal look, with one commenting: "Lovely dress looks good on you," while another added: "You look amazing! Just catching up on the show now".</p> <p><strong>DISCOVER: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20210930123003/ruth-langsford-exquisite-figure-flattering-parka-coat-back-in-stock/" target="_blank" rel="">Ruth Langsford causes a stir in gorgeous parka coat</a></strong></p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!'s selection is editorial and independently chosen – we only feature items our editors love and approve of. HELLO! may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/" target="_blank" rel="">FAQ page</a>.</p> </body></html>
item.dc:creator: Grace Lindsay

item.title: Carol Kirkwood 'permanently scarred' from accident that led to 10lb weight gain
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/carol-kirkwood/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong> Carol Kirkwood</strong></a> was involved in a traumatic bike accident back in 2020, and the <em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/bbc-breakfast/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>BBC Breakfast</strong></a></em> weather reporter has since opened up about how it has affected both her mental and physical health.</p> <p><strong>SEE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20210927122623/louise-minchin-bbc-breakfast-triathlete-exercise-swim/" target="_blank" rel="">Louise Minchin overcomes personal challenge after leaving BBC Breakfast – see photo</a></strong></p> <p>Speaking to the <em><a href="https://www.independent.co.uk/life-style/health-and-families/carol-kirkwood-bbc-police-chris-berkshire-b1905061.html" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><strong>Independent</strong></a></em>, she explained that she was hit by a car while cycling in Slough, Berkshire. The collision left her with such a bad knee injury that her "nerves were hanging out". Thankfully, everything was put back in its rightful place, but Carol added that it has been an ongoing battle.</p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="oux0bH78" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/oux0bH78-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: Carol Kirkwood details terrible accident</strong></p> <p>"I'm permanently scarred," she said. "I've also lost some of the feeling in my knee in places, and I have permanent damage to my thumb joint and scarring to my elbow."</p> <p>She went on to share that she is currently unable to run because of the pain, so has turned to walking in a bid to keep fit.</p> <p>"I try to be careful about my weight. I know people say don’t weigh yourself every day, but I do. And I put on about 10lbs during lockdown, as somebody very kindly pointed out to me. But I had had an accident, so I was immobile. I’m determined to lose the weight."</p> <p><strong>RELATED: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/2017032137511/carol-kirkwood-weight-loss-secret/" target="_blank" rel="">BBC Weather presenter Carol Kirkwood reveals the secret to her weight loss</a></strong></p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/celebrities/2020092998084/bbc-breakfast-weather-carol-kirkwood-talks-divorce/" target="_blank" rel="">BBC Breakfast's Carol Kirkwood opens up about heartache following divorce</a></strong></p> <blockquote class="twitter-tweet"> <p dir="ltr" lang="en">Been off following an accident. Got knocked off my bike by a car and got injured. Biggest thanks ever to the Police (Chris and Faye), the Ambulance Crew (Miranda and Stewart) who tended to me and took me to Hospital. And especially Peter Foskett-Tharby at Wexham Park Hospital ♥️</p> — Carol Kirkwood (@carolkirkwood) <a href="https://twitter.com/carolkirkwood/status/1262622023089565696?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">May 19, 2020</a></blockquote> <script async src="https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js" charset="utf-8"></script> <p>What's more, Carol is now unable to dance after competing in the 2015 series of <em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/strictly-come-dancing/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Strictly Come Dancing.</strong></a></em></p> <p>She explained that it causes her too much pain in her knee, but added that she's still in touch with her former partner and dance pro, Pasha Kovalev.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="carol-kirkwood-bbc" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20211020124351/carol-kirkwood-bbc-breakfast-accident-weight/0-600-404/carol-kirkwood-bbc-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Carol presents the weather segment on BBC Breakfast</strong></p> <p>"I'm on a Whatsapp group with all of my fellow competitors and occasionally at Christmas or at New Year we will drop each other a text," she said.</p> <p>Mentally, Carol said her confidence with cycling has "gone to pot" as she, understandably, fears suffering an injury again, while she also "gets upset talking about it".</p> <p>Carol took three weeks off from presenting to recover after the accident.</p> <p><em><strong>Like this story?<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/newsletter/?utm_source=article&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=newsletter-signup" target="_blank" rel=""> Sign up to our newsletter</a> to get other stories like this delivered straight to your inbox.</strong></em></p> </body></html>
item.dc:creator: Bridie Wilkins

item.title: Heartbreaking reason why Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker's wedding will likely be in America
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p>Wedding planning will soon be underway for <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/kourtney-kardashian/" target=&quot ;_blank" rel=""><strong>Kourtney Kardashian</strong></a> and <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/travis-barker/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Travis Barker</strong></a> after they announced their engagement on Sunday 17 October.</p> <p><strong>RELATED: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/20211018124194/kourtney-kardashian-engagement-ring-compared-to-kim-khloe/" target="_blank" rel="">Kourtney Kardashian's $1 million engagement ring is nothing like Kim and Khloe's</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr">While Kourtney's fans will be eagerly anticipating what wedding dress, flowers and venue she might choose – all of which are bound to be very impressive, in true Kardashian style – one aspect of the nuptials we may be able to predict is the location. It is unlikely that the <em>Keeping Up with the Kardashians</em> star and the <em>Blink-182</em> drummer will choose to have a destination wedding since Travis has rarely taken any plane journeys since he was in a deadly plane crash in 2008 in South Carolina. </p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="3jFsu02d" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/3jFsu02d-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: Kourtney Kardashian shows off her oval-shaped engagement ring</strong></p> <p dir="ltr">Two of his friends and employees, his security guard Charles Still and personal assistant Chris Barker, were tragically killed.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/cuisine/20211018124219/kourtney-kardashian-engagement-party-menu-travis-barker/" target="_blank" rel="">Kourtney Kardashian's engagement party menu at $8,000 per night hotel is jaw-dropping</a></strong></p> <p><strong>RELATED: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/20210827120487/kourtney-kardashian-travis-barker-love-story/" target="_blank" rel="" title="Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker's full love story revealed">Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker's full love story revealed</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr">Travis suffered third-degree burns on 65 per cent of his body and was hospitalised for months. He went through a total of 16 surgeries and was required to have multiple skin grafts to repair his body. In fact, there was so much damage that doctors considered amputating his foot.</p> <p dir="ltr"> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="kourtney-and-travis-engaged" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/brides/20211020124346/kourtney-kardashian-travis-barker-wedding-america-heartbreaking-reason/0-600-387/kourtney-and-travis-engaged-z.jpg"> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>The couple got engaged in Montecito</strong></p> <p dir="ltr">But it wasn't just the physical damage that he suffered from – Travis was also diagnosed with post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD).</p> <p dir="ltr">Although he took one short flight from Los Angeles to Cabo in Mexico with Kourtney in June 2021, the 45-year-old could choose to host his wedding (and perhaps his honeymoon, too) nearby to his home.</p> <p dir="ltr"> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="travis" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/brides/20211020124346/kourtney-kardashian-travis-barker-wedding-america-heartbreaking-reason/0-600-392/travis-z.jpg"> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Travis and Kourtney could choose to have an American wedding</strong></p> <p dir="ltr">This would also mean that the family and children of the couple – who got engaged at a beachside hotel in Montecito, California – could all easily attend. The eldest Kardashian spent a total of eleven years with Scott Disick, with whom she shares four children, Mason, 11, Penelope, 9, and Reign, 6, but the pair never got engaged.</p> <p dir="ltr">Travis was previously married to Melissa Kennedy from 2001 to 2002 and Shanna Moakler from 2004 to 2008. He shares stepdaughter Atiana, 22, son Landon, 17, and daughter Alabama, 15, with Melissa.</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>PHOTOS: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/homes/gallery/20210611115124/kardashian-jenner-homes-property-portfolio-photos/1/" target="_blank" rel="" title="The Kardashian-Jenners' $191million homes: Kim Kardashian, Kylie Jenner and more">The Kardashian-Jenners' $191million homes: Kim Kardashian, Kylie Jenner and more</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr"><meta charset="utf-8"><strong>Read more <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/us/" target="_blank" rel="">HELLO! US</a> stories here</strong></p> </body></html>
item.dc:creator: Nichola Murphy

item.title: Sandra and Harry Redknapp share pictures from inside Jamie's surprise wedding to Frida
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p>Sandra and <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/harry-redknapp/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Harry Redknapp</strong></a> have shared their joy at their son <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/jamie-redknapp/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Jamie</strong></a>'s recent wedding to girlfriend Frida Andersson.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/20211019124249/jamie-redknapp-wife-frida-andersson-name-change-after-wedding/" target="_blank" rel="">Jamie Redknapp's new wife Frida Andersson makes big change after surprise wedding</a></strong></p> <p>The couple, who have been married for 53 years, took to Instagram on Tuesday to share pictures taken at the newlyweds' wedding reception and accompanied them with heartfelt messages.</p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="eJ66XoHz" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/eJ66XoHz-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: 10 of the most spectacular HELLO! exclusive weddings</strong></p> <p>Sandra, 75, shared a black and white photo showing Jamie and Frida holding hands and smiling at each other during their ceremony, which took place at the Chelsea Registry Office in London.</p> <p><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/celebrities/20211019124263/christine-lampard-husband-frank-celebrate-jamie-redknapp-wedding/" target="_blank" rel="">Frank and Christine Lampard celebrate Jamie Redknapp's wedding in style - see photos</a></strong></p> <p><strong>RELATED: </strong><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/20211019124292/jamie-redknapp-wife-frida-andersson-wedding-dress/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Jamie Redknapp's wife Frida Andersson's bump-skimming wedding dress follows this royal trend</strong></a></p> <p>"<strong>Thanking Frida & Jamie for a lovely day and wishing them every happiness for the future</strong>," she lovingly wrote alongside it.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy="Photo: © Instagram"></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="jamie-redknapp-frida-wedding-ceremony" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/brides/20211020124335/jamie-redknapp-pictures-inside-wedding-frida-shared-by-sandra-harry/0-600-344/jamie-redknapp-frida-wedding-ceremony-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Jamie and Frida exchanged vows at the Chelsea Registry Office</strong></p> <p>Her new daughter-in-law loved the message and was quick to reply. "Thank you so much for being there with us Sandra. It was a very special day."</p> <p>Harry, 74, on the other hand, shared a photo from inside the couple's reception, which took place at the trendy Scott's restaurant in Mayfair.</p> <p>The snap shows the couple cutting into their two-tier wedding cake.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy="Photo: © Instagram"></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="frida-and-jamie-redknapp-wedding-cake" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/brides/20211020124335/jamie-redknapp-pictures-inside-wedding-frida-shared-by-sandra-harry/0-600-342/frida-and-jamie-redknapp-wedding-cake-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>The couple celebrated with family and friends at Scott's restaurant</strong></p> <p>"Celebrating with friends and family for Jamie and Frida's wedding. What a day we had sharing your special day," Harry wrote alongside it.</p> <p>Jamie and Harry's wedding was low-key with just the closest friends and family in attendance, including Jamie's two sons with former wife Louise Redknapp, Charlie, 17, and Beau, 12.</p> <p>For their surprise nuptials, the 37-year-old bride looked picture perfect in a stunning off-shoulder white dress which highlighted her blossoming baby bump, while Jamie, 48, put on a dapper display in a slick navy suit with white shirt and black tie.</p> <p>The wedding comes shortly after the couple celebrated their first anniversary this summer and one month before they will welcome their first child together. The Swedish beauty confirmed her pregnancy back in May. Whilst they didn't officially announce the news, Frida later took to the comments section on her Instagram to respond to congratulatory messages.</p> </body></html>
item.dc:creator: Andrea Caamano

item.title: Harper Beckham's stylish night out with David and Victoria revealed
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/harper-beckham/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Harper Beckham</strong></a> is just the cutest! On Tuesday evening, proud mother Victoria shared a snap in celebration of the ten-year-old having a date night with her and David.</p> <p><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20211004123183/harper-beckham-wears-heart-shape-necklace-victoria-beckham-instagram/" target="_blank" rel="">Harper Beckham's diamond Tiffany necklace revealed?</a></strong></p> <p>In the sweet picture, Harper Seven can be seen cuddled up to her dad, grinning from ear-to-ear. Aww! VB wrote: "Date night with mummy and daddy. We love you Harper Seven x kisses @davidbeckham."</p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="3pC9qEYB" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/3pC9qEYB-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: Victoria Beckham and Harper Seven enjoy a girls night</strong></p> <p>Harper wore a dress she has rocked before and we love it. The frock featured a vintage floral print, square neckline and the cutest puff sleeves. The youngest Beckham child's clothes tend to come from French label Bonpoint, so perhaps it was a past-season buy.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/hair/20211011123686/harper-beckham-hair-style-change-david-beckham-instagram/" target="_blank" rel="">Harper Beckham's got a new hairstyle and we love it</a></strong></p> <p>The former Spice Girl's daughter has always loved fashion and in 2019 even designed her own Bonpoint dress for her christening. Talk about chip off the block, right?</p> <iframe width="320" height="320" frameBorder="0" src="https://www.instagram.com/p/CVPTbr7rMPU/embed" frameborder="0"></iframe> <p>Taking to Instagram with a video of the parcel from Bon Point, which consisted of sketches and material swatches, VB said: "Bon Point have designed Harper's christening dress, they've given her three fabrics for her to choose from as well."</p> <h2 style="text-align:center">Get the look!</h2> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="floral-dress-river-island" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/celebrity-style/20211020124347/harper-beckham-dress-date-night-with-david-victoria-instagram/0-600-379/floral-dress-river-island-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Girls Pink Floral Dress, £28, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.riverisland.com%2Fp%2Fgirls-pink-floral-shirt-dress-476984" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="floral dress">River Island</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.riverisland.com%2Fp%2Fgirls-pink-floral-shirt-dress-476984" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="floral dress">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>She then panned the camera over a sketch of Harper's cape that she wore on her big day, and said: "And this beautiful cashmere cape for on top of her dress. I have to say, it has been the most incredible experience to be a part of - their attention to detail, craftsmanship is really quite incredible. The attention to detail … the clothes are beautifully made and I'm excited for everyone to see which dress she goes for."</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="harper-beckham-instagram" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/celebrity-style/20211020124347/harper-beckham-dress-date-night-with-david-victoria-instagram/0-600-380/harper-beckham-instagram-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Harper wore a Bon Point dress at her christening in 2019</strong></p> <p>And in 2018, Victoria shared another video of her daughter<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/2018042059213/harper-beckham-victoria-beckham-fashion-flair/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong> in the American Girl doll store in the US</strong></a>, where she had designed the doll's outfit. Victoria approved of her daughter's eye for fashion, writing: "Super chic! Harper's design!"</p> <p><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/mother-and-baby/20211017124154/victoria-beckham-pamper-girls-night-harper-seven/" target="_blank" rel="">Victoria Beckham shares adorable 'mummy moment' with mini-me Harper Seven</a></strong></p> <p>We predict big things for Miss Beckham in the future; watch this space...</p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!'s selection is editorial and independently chosen – we only feature items our editors love and approve of. HELLO! may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/" target="_blank" rel="">FAQ page</a>.</p> </body></html>
item.dc:creator: Laura Sutcliffe

item.title: Carol Vorderman's plush living room is the epitome of Hollywood glamour
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/carol-vorderman/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong&gt ;Carol Vorderman</strong></a> invited <strong>HELLO! </strong>into her North Somerset home for a <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/celebrities/20211017123855/carol-vorderman-being-single-health-secrets-exclusive-interview/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>photoshoot and interview</strong></a> - and the star unveiled her jaw-dropping living room which is out of this world.</p> <p><strong>READ:</strong> <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/cuisine/20210909121350/carol-vorderman-daily-diet-and-fitness-routine-revealed/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Carol Vorderman's daily diet: how she maintains her fabulous figure</strong></a></p> <p>The former <em>Countdown</em> star posed for pictures wearing a glamorous black evening dress against the beautiful backdrop of her own home – and the location did not disappoint.</p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="71ALQWaU" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/71ALQWaU-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Carol Vorderman is our Digital Cover star</strong></p> <p>The vast open-plan space looks like something which belongs in a <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/homes/gallery/20210611115124/kardashian-jenner-homes-property-portfolio-photos/1/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Kardashian mansion</strong></a> – ultra-modern and oh-so plush.</p> <p>The panoramic glass doors which open out onto the garden and balcony ensure the space is light and airy at all times. But it still manages to be suitably cosy with a huge log burner and snuggly furnishings.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy="Photo: © HELLO!"></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="carol-vorderman-living-room" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20211020124349/carol-vorderman-house-somerset-living-room-photos/0-600-383/carol-vorderman-living-room-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Carol has a breathtaking living room</strong></p> <p>Carol also has an office space located on a mezzanine level, allowing her to sit and survey the pristine living room from above as she works.</p> <p><strong>MORE: </strong><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/celebrities/20211007123485/carol-vorderman-reveals-heartbreak-tv-appearance-son-cameron/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Carol Vorderman reveals heartbreak after TV appearance with son</strong></a></p> <p><strong>SEE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20211010123644/carol-vorderman-shows-off-incredible-figure-red-leggings/" target="_blank" rel="">Carol Vorderman shows off incredible figure in skin-tight leggings</a></strong></p> <p>This sadly isn't a forever home for Carol though as she has ambitious plans to spend more time in her home country of Wales, where she already has two beautiful properties.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy="Photo: © Instagram"></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="carol-vorderman-view" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20211020124349/carol-vorderman-house-somerset-living-room-photos/0-600-386/carol-vorderman-view-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>The star has an impressive home in Pembrokeshire too</strong></p> <p>Her swanky Pembrokeshire pad has a sweeping balcony and epic views – and Carol enjoys soaking up as much as Wales as possible. "I never come back from a walk in Wales with anything but the biggest smile. Everything is amazing and the views are breathtaking," she revealed.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy="Photo: © Instagram"></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="campervan" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20211020124349/carol-vorderman-house-somerset-living-room-photos/0-600-385/campervan-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Carol is buying a campervan to go travelling</strong></p> <p>But Carol also admitted: "I am a wanderer; I've always been a wanderer. I love making homes, but I don't want to be in them very much." Which is why she's ordered a campervan and plans to travel around and sleep outdoors. </p> <p>"<em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/im-a-celebrity/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>I'm a Celebrity</strong></a></em> was the first time I slept under the stars for three whole weeks, no tent, just the sky and the air, and I became addicted to being outside. I've ordered a 4x4 van and I'm working with a company to convert it. I've got a lot of farmer friends and I want to park up in their fields," she explained.</p> <p> </p> <p><em><strong>Like this story?<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/newsletter/?utm_source=article&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=newsletter-signup" target="_blank" rel=""> Sign up to our newsletter</a> to get other stories like this delivered straight to your inbox.</strong></em></p> <p> </p> </body></html>
item.dc:creator: Rachel Avery

item.title: Adele eats this £4.79 McDonald's meal once a week
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p dir="ltr">We don't know about you, but ever since <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/adele/" targ et="_blank" rel=""><strong>Adele</strong></a> dropped *that* unexpected Instagram Live last week, we've been left with so many questions about the multiple Grammy Award-winner's palette...</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/cuisine/20210329109926/adele-sirtfood-daily-diet-revealed/" target="_blank" rel="">Adele's daily diet: Did the singer follow the Sirtfood diet?</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr">A self-confessed "foodie", Adele's tell-all chat with her 42 million followers revealed so much about the star's bizarre snacking habits, including how she likes to add Worcestershire sauce to her Ready Salted Walker's crisps. </p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="u69wqsP7" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/u69wqsP7-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: Adele secretly drops her latest single - and fans go wild</strong></p> <p dir="ltr">Luckily, Adele's latest video with <strong><a href="https://www.vogue.co.uk/arts-and-lifestyle/article/adele-taste-test-video" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><em>British VOGUE</em> </a> </strong>is here to explain where the star's unusual food combinations come from - and ngl, it makes so much sense. </p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>MORE:</strong> <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20211008123512/adele-breaks-silence-100lb-weight-loss-work-out-exercises/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Adele reveals she works out 'two or three times a day' in new interview</strong></a></p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>SEE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20211014123921/adele-workout-exercise-regime/" target="_blank" rel="">I tried Adele's extreme three-workouts-a-day regime – and the results might surprise you</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr">The video saw the <em>Easy On Me</em> songstress return to her North London roots, tasting traditional British dishes from pickled eggs to spotted dick.</p> <p dir="ltr"> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="adele-in-british-vogue" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/cuisine/20211020124343/adele-reveals-favourite-food-mcdonalds/0-600-395/adele-in-british-vogue-z.jpg"> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>The songstress took on the Ultimate British Taste Test for <em>British VOGUE</em></strong></p> <p dir="ltr">"I actually used to work at a cafe," explained Adele. "I worked at the River Lee Caf in Tottenham, where I’d just be helping take out the food and stuff like that. But a year later I was making some of those breakfasts! Only got £25 for the whole day."</p> <p dir="ltr">Admitting she was never taught how to cook at home, the star told Vogue: <strong>“I learnt to cook on my own. I was getting loads of takeaways and it was just costing too much money so I think I read 30-minute meals by good old Jamie Oliver, and that’s how I learnt the basics of cooking."</strong></p> <p dir="ltr"> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="jamie-30-min-meals" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/cuisine/20211020124343/adele-reveals-favourite-food-mcdonalds/0-600-370/jamie-30-min-meals-z.jpg"> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Jamie's 30-Minute Meals, £17 / $24, <a href="https://geni.us/jamie-30-min" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">Amazon</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a href="http://geni.us/jamie-30-min" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></p> <p dir="ltr">From cafe waitress to culinary goddess, the talented star said: "I do make an incredible spicy pasta,' before revealing her and her son's favourite dish is a Sunday roast. "I’m pretty great at doing [a roast] every single Sunday."</p> <p dir="ltr">Surprisingly, despite her incredible transformation, Adele hasn't severed her relationship with fast food. (And who can't resist a treat?) "My last meal would be McChicken Nuggets, with a Big Mac and then fries - that’s my three courses. I eat it at least once a week," said Adele. </p> <p dir="ltr"> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="adele-football-shirt" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/cuisine/20211020124343/adele-reveals-favourite-food-mcdonalds/0-600-398/adele-football-shirt-z.jpg"> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Adele eats her favourite McDonald's meal at least once a week</strong></p> <p dir="ltr">On discussing her weight loss, Adele told <em>VOGUE</em> in a previous interview that she ramped up her fitness regime to help with her anxiety as "it was always about becoming strong and giving myself as much time every day without my phone", but admitted that she had become "addicted". </p> <p dir="ltr">She added: "I do my weights in the morning, then I normally hike or box in the afternoon, and then I go and do my cardio at night. I was basically unemployed when I was doing it. And I do it with trainers."</p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!'s selection is editorial and independently chosen – we only feature items our editors love and approve of. HELLO! may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/" target="_blank" rel="">FAQ page</a>.</p> </body></html>
item.dc:creator: Georgia Brown

item.title: GMB's Susanna Reid reaches out to unhappy guest after show makes major mistake
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/susanna-reid/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Susanna Reid</strong></a> has reached out to a guest who appeared on <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/good-morning-britain/" target="_blank" rel=""><em><strong>Good Morning Britain</strong></em></a> this week, addressing a major mistake made by the ITV show.</p> <p><strong>SEE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20211020124341/bill-turnbull-susanna-reid-co-host-illness-prostate-cancer-update/" target="_blank" rel="">Susanna Reid's co-host Bill Turnbull shares rare update on battle with terminal cancer</a></strong></p> <p>Professor Devi Sridhar - Chair of Global Public Health at Edinburgh University - was one of a number of experts to take part in a discussion on COVID-19 alongside three male counterparts.</p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="su2GnOYJ" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/su2GnOYJ-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: Susanna Reid breaks down in tears during Good Morning Britain interview</strong></p> <p>But she was the only one to appear on screen without her title; her name banner simply read Devi Sridhar while the other guests' names were prefixed with their titles.</p> <p><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20210929122814/susanna-reid-good-morning-britain-tinnitus-cure/" target="_blank" rel="">GMB's Susanna Reid's condition is 'incurable'</a></strong></p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/homes/gallery/20210908121093/good-morning-britain-presenters-homes-photos/1/" target="_blank" rel="">GMB stars' luxury homes: Kate Garraway, Ben Shephard and more</a></strong></p> <p>Professor Devi herself highlighted the mistake on Twitter, sharing a screenshot to illustrate her point and writing: "Can women be professors in 2021?" along with a thinking face emoji.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="gmb-professor-titles" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/film/20211020124337/susanna-reid-apologises-guest-professor-title-gmb/0-600-348/gmb-professor-titles-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Professor Devi Sridhar highlighted the issue on Twitter</strong></p> <p>Host Susanna was among those to see the tweet and she reached out to the professor to send her apologies. "I am really sorry that this happened," she wrote. "We introduced you with your title Professor but inexplicably it wasn't on screen."</p> <p>Professor Devi graciously replied to her tweet, writing, "Innocent mistake - thanks always Susanna" - but not before some viewers expressed their thoughts.</p> <p><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20211018124202/richard-madeley-gmb-kate-middleton-duchess-of-cambridge-comment-size/" target="_blank" rel="">GMB's Richard Madeley shocks fans with comment on Kate Middleton's size - watch</a></strong></p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/celebrities/20211012123741/piers-morgan-sad-new-parents-dog-dies/" target="_blank" rel="">Piers Morgan reveals his heartbreak as he announces sad death of family member</a></strong></p> <p>"This is one of those subtle examples of misogyny that most don't notice," one wrote. "But it's exactly these small, possibly unconscious, differences in how men and women are treated that normalise the bigger differences. It snowballs."</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="gmb-expert-panel" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/film/20211020124337/susanna-reid-apologises-guest-professor-title-gmb/0-600-349/gmb-expert-panel-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>The guest expert has appeared on GMB on a number of occasions</strong></p> <p>A second questioned: "Or maybe it's a simple oversight? Are there other examples which might show it is only women to whom this error has occurred?" - with another follower writing in reply: "3 men all had professor before their name. The 1 lady professor didn't."</p> <p>One viewer remarked: "They choose to do this, if we correct them we are 'petty' but if we don't then they get away with misrepresenting & disrespecting women & their achievements. Never used to worry about titles etc, still do not wish to, but forced into it by their selective usage by powers that be." And another simply stated: "GMB this is unacceptable."</p> <p><em><strong>Like this story?<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/newsletter/?utm_source=article&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=newsletter-signup" target="_blank" rel=""> Sign up to our newsletter</a> to get other stories like this delivered straight to your inbox.</strong></em></p> </body></html>
item.dc:creator: Gemma Strong

item.title: Phillip Schofield mourns devastating loss of famous friend
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p><strong><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/this-morning/" target="_blank" rel="">&l t;em>This Morning</em></a></strong> star <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/phillip-schofield/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Phillip Schofield</strong></a> has taken to Instagram to mark the loss of his friend and star Leslie Bricusse.</p> <p><strong>SEE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20210920122116/phillip-schofield-julia-bradbury-cancer/" target="_blank" rel="">Phillip Schofield gets emotional over Julia Bradbury's cancer diagnosis</a></strong></p> <p>Phillip shared a photo of Leslie on his Instagram Stories and wrote: "I'm so sad to hear of the death of my friend, the brilliant Leslie Bricusse whose songs I loved singing in Dr Dolittle. My love to his family."</p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="6MwQPb2h" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/6MwQPb2h-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: Phillip Schofield reacts to Julia Bradbury's cancer diagnosis</strong></p> <p>Phillip and Leslie became friends after Phillip was cast in the title role of the original Dr Dolittle London production in 1998.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy="Photo: © Instagram"></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="PHILLIP-SCHOFIELD-LESLIE" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20211020124348/phillip-schofield-leslie-bricusse-death-tribute/0-600-390/phillip-schofield-leslie-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Phillip shared a photo of Leslie on Instagram</strong></p> <p>Leslie's agent confirmed the news of the 90-year-old's death "with a breaking heart", adding that he died in his sleep on Tuesday morning.</p> <p>Leslie's son paid tribute to his late father with a post of his own, reading: "My dearest father passed away peacefully this morning. Please raise a glass for him. Love. Forever. RIP Dad. 'Sleep in peace when the day is done, and I'm feeling good.' – Feeling Good, Leslie Bricusse."</p> <p><strong>SEE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20210923122365/phillip-schofield-this-morning-health-eye-sight-floaters/" target="_blank" rel="">Phillip Schofield's battle with 'debilitating' condition REVEALED</a></strong></p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20211012123791/holly-willoughby-phillip-schofield-support-julia-bradbury-breast-cancer-this-morning/" target="_blank" rel="">Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield share heartfelt moment for Julia Bradbury after mastectomy - watch</a></strong></p> <blockquote class="instagram-media" data-instgrm-permalink="https://www.instagram.com/p/CVN77x-Amvx/?utm_source=ig_embed&utm_campaign=loading" data-instgrm-version="14" style=" background:#FFF; height:12.5px; transform:translateX(9px) translateY(-18px); width:12.5px"> </div> </div> <div style="margin-left:8px"> <div style="background-color:#f4f4f4; border-radius:50%; flex-grow:0; height:20px; width:20px"> </div> <div style="border-bottom:2px solid transparent; border-left:6px solid #f4f4f4; border-top:2px solid transparent; height:0; transform:translateX(16px) translateY(-4px) rotate(30deg); width:0"> </div> </div> <div style="margin-left:auto"> <div style="border-right:8px solid transparent; border-top:8px solid #f4f4f4; transform:translateY(16px); width:0px"> </div> <div style="background-color:#f4f4f4; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-style:normal; font-weight:normal; line-height:17px; text-decoration:none;">A post shared by Joan Collins (@joancollinsdbe)</a></p> </div> </blockquote> <script async src="//www.instagram.com/embed.js"></script> <p>Elaine Page added: "Shocked & saddened by the news that the brilliant & wonderful Leslie Bricusse has died. One of our great songwriters. My first ever professional role was in Roar of the Greasepaint musical. We’ve been friends for many years."</p> <p>The exact cause of his death is not yet known.</p> <p>Leslie was an Oscar and Grammy award-winning songwriter, having penned the lyrics for the theme to James Bond's <em>Goldfinger</em>, as well as various songs for other films including <em>Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory</em> and <em>Doctor Dolittle. </em></p> <p><em><strong>Like this story?<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/newsletter/?utm_source=article&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=newsletter-signup" target="_blank" rel=""> Sign up to our newsletter</a> to get other stories like this delivered straight to your inbox.</strong></em></p> </body></html>
