item.title: Steph McGovern reveals latest 'medical drama' and the impact it will have on her health
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/steph-mcgovern/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Steph McGovern</strong></a> has revealed her "medical drama" following a flight from Belfast with her Instagram followers on Tuesday.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20210921122174/steph-mcgovern-weight-loss-secret-amid-ibs-struggle/" target="_blank" rel="">Steph McGovern reveals the secret to recent weight loss amid IBS battle</a></strong></p> <p>Taking to Stories, the 39-year-old shared a series of snapshots of her swollen leg which was caused by an insect bite. The itchy swelling started to grow, prompting Steph to seek advice from her doctor.</p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="adThT0dZ" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/adThT0dZ-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: Inside Steph McGovern's weight loss journey</strong></p> <p>"My latest medical drama..." she began. "I was on a flight back from Belfast on Sunday eve when I noticed my leg felt itchy. <strong>I looked down at my shin and could see a red lump.</strong> A bloody insect bite in October on a UK flight?! How annoying."</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/celebrities/20210909121302/steph-mcgovern-surprise-bbc-breakfast-return-for-louise-minchin/" target="_blank" rel="">Steph McGovern makes surprise return to BBC Breakfast for this sweet reason</a></strong></p> <p><strong>SEE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/celebrities/20210819119914/steph-mcgovern-date-nights-girlfriend-during-tv-break/" target="_blank" rel="">Steph McGovern gives fans sneak peek into date nights with the 'missus'</a></strong></p> <p>She then shared a snap of the red lump before a doctor told her to draw a circle around the swelling to see if it got bigger. Unfortunately, the swelling appeared bigger overnight. "Of course, it got bigger… and bigger. Full on swollen leg," she added.</p> <p>Eventually, Steph revealed he was diagnosed with Cellulitis and is on antibiotics. However, the medication will now play havoc with her IBS.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="steph-mcgovern-swollen-leg" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20211020124345/steph-mcgovern-medical-drama-graphic-pictures/0-600-388/steph-mcgovern-swollen-leg-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>One of the snaps Steph shared of her swollen leg</strong></p> <p>"Gutted I have to take antibiotics because it wipes out the good bacteria in my gut, which means my IBS will probably be bad again." In a tongue-in-cheek remark, she then said: "Still, better than sying of sepsis."</p> <p>Cellulitis is a skin infection that's treated with antibiotics. According to the NHS website, it can be serious if it's not treated quickly.</p> <p>"It is usually caused by a bacterial infection," the website reads. "The bacteria can infect the deeper layers of your skin if it's broken, for example, because of an insect bite or cut, or if it's cracked and dry."</p> <p><em><strong>Make sure you never miss a story! <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/newsletter/?utm_source=article&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=newsletter-signup" target="_blank" rel="">Sign up to our newsletter</a> to get all of our celebrity, royal and lifestyle news delivered directly to your inbox.</strong></em></p> </body></html>
item.dc:creator: Sharnaz Shahid

item.title: Royal family's website shares update on Princess Beatrice's daughter Sienna
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p>The royal family's <a href="https://www.royal.uk/succession" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">& lt;strong>website</strong></a> has been updated to include <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/princess-beatrice/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Princess Beatrice</strong></a> and <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/edoardo-mapelli-mozzi/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Edoardo Mapelli Mozzi</strong></a>'s daughter Sienna to the line of succession.</p> <p>The change comes one month after the tot's birth at the Chelsea and Westminster Hospital on 18 September.</p> <p>Sienna Mapelli Mozzi is 11th in line to the throne behind her mother, meaning her aunt, <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/princess-eugenie/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Princess Eugenie</strong></a>, is now 12th and Eugenie's son, <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/august-brooksbank/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>August Brooksbank</strong></a>, is 13th.</p> <p><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/royalty/20211019124319/prince-william-kate-middleton-lavish-postponed-reception-princess-diana-statue-unveiling/" target="_blank" rel="">Prince William and Kate Middleton host postponed reception to mark Princess Diana's statue</a></strong></p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="2VLFAKLe" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/2VLFAKLe-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: Beatrice and Edoardo confirm the name of their royal baby</strong></p> <p>It's not unusual that the line of succession on the royal family's website isn't updated straight after a birth. Similarly, it was almost two months before August was added to the website after he was born in February and <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/royalty/20210726118285/meghan-markle-lilibet-diana-added-to-royal-family-website/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>just over a month</strong></a> before it was updated to include the Duke and <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/meghan-markle/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Duchess of Sussex</strong></a>'s daughter, <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/lilibet-diana/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Lilibet</strong></a>, following her birth in June.</p> <p>Beatrice and Edoardo <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/royalty/20211001119735/princess-beatrice-reveals-royal-baby-name/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>confirmed the name</strong></a> of their baby girl almost two weeks after her birth. In a personal tweet, Beatrice shared a sweet photo of the baby's footprints and wrote: <strong>"We are delighted to share that we have named our daughter Sienna Elizabeth Mapelli Mozzi. We are all doing well and Wolfie is the best big brother to Sienna."</strong></p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/royalty/20211019124275/the-queen-rejects-oldie-of-the-year-award/" target="_blank" rel="">The Queen turns down award about her age: 'You're only as old as you feel'</a></strong></p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/royalty/20211019124276/ant-mcpartlin-talks-kate-middleton-previous-addiction-problems/" target="_blank" rel="">Ant McPartlin opens up to Kate Middleton about previous addiction problems at campaign launch</a></strong></p> <p><strong> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy="Photo: © Instagram"></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </strong></p><img alt="princess-beatrice-baby-footprints" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/royalty/20211020124342/royal-family-website-shares-update-princess-beatrice-royal-baby-sienna/0-600-377/princess-beatrice-baby-footprints-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>The couple shared a picture of Sienna's footprints</strong></p> <p>Edoardo added on Instagram: "Sienna Elizabeth Mapelli Mozzi. Our life together has just begun, and I can’t wait to see all the amazing things that await us. <strong>Feeling so much love and gratitude for my amazing wife, baby Sienna and Wolfie. These are the days I never want to forget.</strong> This week, a friend said to me the sweetest saying….that with every child you grow a whole new heart. A massive thank you to the Midwife and the amazing team at the Chelsea and Westminster Hospital."</p> <p>Sienna is <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/the-queen/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>the Queen</strong></a>'s 12th great-grandchild and the fourth one to be born in 2021 alone.</p> <p><em><strong>Make sure you never miss a ROYAL story! <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/newsletter/?utm_source=article&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=newsletter-signup" target="_blank" rel="">Sign up to our newsletter</a> to get all of our celebrity, royal and lifestyle news delivered directly to your inbox.</strong></em></p> </body></html>
item.dc:creator: Danielle Stacey

item.title: Susanna Reid's co-host Bill Turnbull shares rare update on battle with terminal cancer
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p>Former <em><strong><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/good-morning-britain/" target="_blank" rel="">GMB</a> </strong></em>and <em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/bbc-breakfast/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>BBC Breakfast</strong></a></em> star <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/bill-turnbull/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Bill Turnbull</strong></a>, who hosted the shows alongside <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/susanna-reid/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Susanna Reid</strong></a>, has shared an update on his battle with prostate cancer. He revealed he had the illness in March 2018, after being diagnosed the previous November, and is still living with it today.</p> <p><strong>SEE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/2018122165865/bill-turnbull-talks-cancer-diagnosis-bbc-breakfast/" target="_blank" rel="">Bill Turnbull reveals 'dark times' following incurable cancer diagnosis in BBC Breakfast return</a></strong></p> <p>A fan recently took to Twitter to share a video in which Bill spoke out about the importance of prostate checks for BBC One, and asked: "@billtu popped up on my Facebook memories today Bill… How are you doing?"</p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="su2GnOYJ" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/su2GnOYJ-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: Susanna Reid breaks down in tears on GMB</strong></p> <p>Bill replied: "Still here!" to which his follower concluded: "Fantastic. Thought I'd not seen you on the television for a while. Cheers Bill and all the best with everything."</p> <p>Bill first opened up about his battle with prostate cancer on an episode of Good Morning Britain, when he shared that is was incurable, and had spread to his spine, pelvis, ribs, hips and legs.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/2018030846831/bill-turnbull-overwhelmed-by-love-after-cancer-diagnosis/" target="_blank" rel="">Bill Turnbull 'overwhelmed with love' after revealing cancer diagnosis</a></strong></p> <p><strong>STORY: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/2018030746797/bill-turnbull-told-children-cancer-diagnosis/" target="_blank" rel="">Bill Turnbull reveals moment he told children he had cancer</a></strong></p> <p>In 2019, he told Prostate Cancer UK: "When you’re diagnosed with prostate cancer it can be a pretty scary moment. It was for me. Particularly because it had already spread to my bones and the long-term outlook wasn’t good at all. It was a big shock for me and for my family, and we had some pretty dark times. But luckily, I started treatment very quickly after my diagnosis."</p> <blockquote class="twitter-tweet"> <p dir="ltr" lang="en"><a href="https://twitter.com/billtu?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">@billtu</a> popped up on my Facebook memories today Bill..how are you doing? <a href="https://t.co/OAILvPzOPb" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">pic.twitter.com/OAILvPzOPb</a></p> — JohnCUFC (@johnroger40) <a href="https://twitter.com/johnroger40/status/1448345543785291783?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">October 13, 2021</a></blockquote> <script async src="https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js" charset="utf-8"></script> <p>Now, Bill has a radioactive isotope injected into him once every six weeks. "It makes you so live, so to speak, that I have to sleep in a separate room for three days, no prolonged contact with small children or pregnant women for six days," he explained.</p> <p>On another episode of <em>GMB </em>last year, he told Susanna Reid and Piers Morgan that he had come to terms with the idea of passing away.</p> <p>"I've developed quite a healthy relationship with death, I feel very, very calm about it because I've given it a lot of thought. There's no way I'm going to imagine I can live forever, nor would I really want to."</p> <p>Bill has been with his wife Sarah since 1988, and they share three children together: Henry, Will and Flora.</p> <p><em><strong>Like this story?<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/newsletter/?utm_source=article&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=newsletter-signup" target="_blank" rel=""> Sign up to our newsletter</a> to get other stories like this delivered straight to your inbox.</strong></em></p> </body></html>
item.dc:creator: Bridie Wilkins

Sure, the <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/kate-middleton-style/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Duchess of Cambridge</strong></a> owns some priceless heirlooms and diamond-laden <a href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&mid=41148&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fuk.missoma.com%2F" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="missoma"><strong>Missoma</strong></a>, that to countdown to Christmas with</a></strong></p> <p>Kate has been spotted in Missoma jewellery on royal tours, official Zoom calls and royal engagements, including in <a carry a secret meaning.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="missoma-pyramid" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20211019124265/kate-middleton-missoma-wish-list/0-600-25/missoma-pyramid-z.jpg"> <p title="pyramid earrings">Missoma</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" title="pyramid earrings"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>The delicate drop earrings feature the Rhodochrosite stone, a "heart-based healing crystal that radiates love, compassion and all-around good vibes."</p> <p>And it’s not rocket science to see why she’s such a Missoma fangirl. The demi-fine jewellery is always on-trend, releasing contemporary but completely wearable pieces time and time again.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/20210513113121/best-signet-rings-for-women/" target="_blank" rel="">This jewellery trend has made a comeback - thanks to Meghan Markle</a></strong></p> <p><strong>SEE THE PICS: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/gallery/20210529114119/royals-borrow-the-queen-jewellery-tiaras-earrings/1/" target="_blank" rel="">When royals borrow the Queen's jewels</a></strong></p> <p>Crafted mostly from 18ct vermeil gold, the pieces never tarnish either, so no green fingers or ears. Kate took her beloved Missoma earrings on the 2019 royal tour to Pakistan – gorgeous!</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="kate-missoma-fan-earrings" itemprop="image" Zenyu Chandelier Earrings, £125, <a class="aff_text" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&mid=41148&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fuk.missoma.com%2Fproducts%2Fzenyu-chandelier-hoops" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="chandelier earrings">Missoma</a></strong></p> <p>From huggie hoops to engravable disc necklaces, plus collaborations with influencers and fashion designers, if you haven’t already bookmarked Missoma, you need to.</p> <p>Taking our cue from Kate’s perfectly picked jewellery, we're hedging our bets that these Missoma earrings will be spotted on the Duchess in due course – and if not on Kate, they will definitely be spotted on us…</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> Earrings, £49, <a class="aff_text" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&mid=41148&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fuk.missoma.com%2Fproducts%2Fmini-molten-hoop-earrings" rel="nofollow hoops">SHOP NOW</a> </strong></h6> <p>Hoops are our staple, and Kate’s not adverse to a hoop either – she owns these <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/2020032286673/kate-middleton-missoma-gold-hoop-earrings/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Molten Hoop Earrings in the small size</strong></a>, src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20211019124265/kate-middleton-missoma-wish-list/0-600-28/pearl-earrings-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Pearl Single Drop Earring, £79, <a class="aff_text" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&mid=41148&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fuk.missoma.com%2Fproducts%2Fshort-drop-single-earring" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="missoma earring">Missoma</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&mid=41148&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fuk.missoma.com%2Fproducts%2Fshort-drop-single-earring" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="missoma earring"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p> This year’s pearl jewellery trend saw the classic stone shake off it’s stuffy persona and become the coolest gemstone of 2021. Missoma’s drop earring features a white pearl and black onyx – wear alone or buy as a pair.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="green-earrings" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20211019124265/kate-middleton-missoma-wish-list/0-600-29/green-earrings-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Mini Shield Hoops, £69, <a class="aff_text" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&mid=41148&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fuk.missoma.com%2Fproducts%2Fmini-shield-hoop-earrings%3Fvariant%3D39356244983911" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="shield">Missoma</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&mid=41148&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fuk.missoma.com%2Fproducts%2Fmini-shield-hoop-earrings%3Fvariant%3D39356244983911" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="shield"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Jewellery with meaning is a sweet, subtle way to carry a hidden message; Missoma’s mini shield hoops carry a small Malachite crystal, known as the stone of transformation and protection.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="harris-reed-earrings" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20211019124265/kate-middleton-missoma-wish-list/0-600-36/harris-reed-earrings-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Harris Reed Moonlight Hoop Earrings, £175, <a class="aff_text" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&mid=41148&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fuk.missoma.com%2Fproducts%2Fharris-reed-moonlight-hoop-earrings" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="harris reed">Missoma</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&mid=41148&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fuk.missoma.com%2Fproducts%2Fharris-reed-moonlight-hoop-earrings" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="harris reed"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p> As part of Missoma’s exclusive collaboration with fashion designer Harris Reed, this stunning pair of earrings were made for festive parties. Handcrafted with recycled metal elements, they feature Pearl Cabochon and White Cubic Zirconia Pave.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="missoma-double-hoops" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20211019124265/kate-middleton-missoma-wish-list/0-600-40/missoma-double-hoops-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Mini Double Beaded Hoop Earrings, £79, <a class="aff_text" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&mid=41148&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fuk.missoma.com%2Fproducts%2Fdouble-beaded-mini-hoop-earrings" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="missoma hoops">Missoma</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&mid=41148&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fuk.missoma.com%2Fproducts%2Fdouble-beaded-mini-hoop-earrings" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="missoma hoops"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>A huggie hoop with a difference, these 18ct gold plated vermeil earrings will elevate your everyday earring stack with double beading all over.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="ridge-heart-earrings" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20211019124265/kate-middleton-missoma-wish-list/0-600-43/ridge-heart-earrings-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Ridge Heart Drop Hoop Earrings, £149, <a class="aff_text" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&mid=41148&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fuk.missoma.com%2Fproducts%2Fridge-heart-drop-hoop-earrings" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="heart earrings">Missoma</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" title="heart"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Giving us 80s Princess Diana vibes, the ridge heart drop earrings are pure fun.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210916121828/best-butterfly-jewellery-necklaces-earrings-rings/" target="_blank" rel="">The 90s butterfly jewellery look is back - and we're LOVING it</a></strong></p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="lucy-hoops" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20211019124265/kate-middleton-missoma-wish-list/0-600-46/lucy-hoops-z.jpg"> <p href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&mid=41148&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fuk.missoma.com%2Fproducts%2Flucy-williams-chunky-entwine-hoops" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="chunky hoops">Missoma</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" title="missoma"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>One place we love to look for inspiration is the bestsellers list – Missoma’s reads like a what’s hot to buy over and over; these Lucy Williams hoops are forever trending, and the perfect accompaniment to a chunky roll neck and hair tuck situation. item.title: 7 vacuum cleaners on eBay with the BEST reviews
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p>Forget spring <strong><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/cleaning/" target="_blank" rel="">cleaning</a> </strong>– autumn is the best time to spruce up your home. If you’re planning a pre-<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/christmas/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>Christmas</strong></a> season blitz you need the proper kit – and top of the list is a good vacuum. If yours doesn’t do the job then don’t despair – <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/ebay/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>eBay</strong></a> will come to your rescue!</p> <p>You can get some amazing deals on the best vacuum cleaners if you get clicking on <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fb%2FCertified-Refurbished%2Fbn_7117653182%3Fmkcid%3D1%26mkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26siteid%3D3%26campid%3D5338841865%26toolid%3D20008%26mkevt%3D1" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="certified refurb"><strong>eBay’s Certified Refurbished shop</strong></a>, a hub of refurbished electronics and home appliances.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/homes/20210415111058/best-ebay-certified-refurbished-deals/" target="_blank" rel="">8 hidden homeware gems you can find on eBay for less</a></strong></p> <p>All the products are as good as new, manufacturer approved and come with a one-year guarantee – and you can save up to 74% on the recommended retail price. We’ve rounded up the best deals on the vacuums with the best reviews below – it’s a no-brainer if you ask us...</p> <h2><strong>Vax CWGRV011 Rapid Power Revive Upright Carpet Washer Upholstery Cleaner</strong></h2> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="vax-carpet-cleaner" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20211020124309/ebay-best-vacuum-cleaners/0-600-241/vax-carpet-cleaner-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Vax carpet washer, £99.99, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F362620746673%3Fmkcid%3D1%26mkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26siteid%3D3%26campid%3D5338841865%26toolid%3D20008%26mkevt%3D1" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="vax cleaner">eBay</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F362620746673%3Fmkcid%3D1%26mkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26siteid%3D3%26campid%3D5338841865%26toolid%3D20008%26mkevt%3D1" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="vax cleaner"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>If you’re looking for the best carpet cleaner this is the one – it deep cleans you carpets and leaves them dry in under an hour – and it has an extra large 4.7l clean tank so you can clean for longer. It features five SpinScrub brushes for a deep, fresh clean and a wash tool for cleaning upholstery, stairs and carpets.</p> <p>This Vax mean machine has a 4.7 out of five rating and shoppers are praising it for being easy to use and leaving carpets looking brand new.</p> <p><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/homes/20211013123893/lynsey-crombie-queen-of-clean-forgotten-home-areas/" target="_blank" rel="">Queen of Clean reveals the 6 home areas we always forget to clean</a></strong></p> <h2><strong>Hoover WRE01 Whirlwind Evo Compact Lightweight Bagless Upright Vacuum Cleaner</strong></h2> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="hoover-red" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20211020124309/ebay-best-vacuum-cleaners/0-600-264/hoover-red-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Hoover Whirlwind Evo vacuum cleaner, £39.99, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F143157947403%3Fmkcid%3D1%26mkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26siteid%3D3%26campid%3D5338841865%26toolid%3D20008%26mkevt%3D1" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="hoover certified">eBay</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F143157947403%3Fmkcid%3D1%26mkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26siteid%3D3%26campid%3D5338841865%26toolid%3D20008%26mkevt%3D1" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="certified"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Need a fab all-rounder that can effortlessly glide from carpets to hard floors, leaving both spotless? The Hoover Whirlwind Evo is the one for you. It’s an ultra-lightweight bagless vacuum which comes with a 2-in-1 dusting brush and crevice tool to take care of a wide range of surfaces, nooks and crannies.</p> <p>Says one satified customer: "Brilliant for the price. Much lighter than I thought and so cheap. I actually thought my old hoover was picking the dust and muck up until I used this one!"</p> <h2><strong>Vax U85-AS-CE Air Stretch Complete Bagless Upright Vacuum Cleaner RRP £199.99</strong></h2> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="vax" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20211020124309/ebay-best-vacuum-cleaners/0-600-267/vax-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Vax Air stretch complete, £54.99, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F381451469892%3Fmkcid%3D1%26mkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26siteid%3D3%26campid%3D5338841865%26toolid%3D20008%26mkevt%3D1" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="vax">eBay</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F381451469892%3Fmkcid%3D1%26mkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26siteid%3D3%26campid%3D5338841865%26toolid%3D20008%26mkevt%3D1" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="vax"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Another great saving – you can shave off £133 if you buy refurbished at eBay – and this powerful vacuum is great if you have allergies. Why? It has a HEPA media filter, which reduces the growth of bacteria, allergens and even pet odours.</p> <p>It’s rated 4.9 out of five – you really can’t get much better than that!</p> <p><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/homes/20210421111530/how-to-make-your-home-eco-friendly/" target="_blank" rel="">11 tips to make your home more eco-friendly</a></strong></p> <h2><strong>Hoover TH31BO02 Breeze Evo Pets Lightweight Hepa Bagless Upright Vacuum Cleaner</strong></h2> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="hoover-blue" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20211020124309/ebay-best-vacuum-cleaners/0-600-268/hoover-blue-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Hoover Breeze Evo Pets vacuum cleaner, £49.99, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F362639400594%3Fmkcid%3D1%26mkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26siteid%3D3%26campid%3D5338841865%26toolid%3D20008%26mkevt%3D1" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="hoover ebay">eBay</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F362639400594%3Fmkcid%3D1%26mkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26siteid%3D3%26campid%3D5338841865%26toolid%3D20008%26mkevt%3D1" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="ebay"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Got a furry friend at home? The Hoover Evo pets model comes with powerful rotating mini turbo brush to loosen and lift stubborn pet hair – and the long 4.5m stretch hose means you can vacuum a 13 step staircase in one go, with no need to hold or balance the vacuum on the stairs!</p> <h2><strong>VYTRONIX Lithium 22V Cordless Upright 3in1 Handheld Stick Vacuum Cleaner</strong></h2> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="purple" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20211020124309/ebay-best-vacuum-cleaners/0-600-269/purple-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>VYTRONIX Lithium 22v Cordless, £45.99, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F142998808934%3Fmkcid%3D1%26mkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26siteid%3D3%26campid%3D5338841865%26toolid%3D20008%26mkevt%3D1" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="lithium hoover">eBay</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F142998808934%3Fmkcid%3D1%26mkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26siteid%3D3%26campid%3D5338841865%26toolid%3D20008%26mkevt%3D1" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="lithium"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>"For the money, you can’t go wrong," says one reviewer of this cordless wonder, which is praised across the board for being easy to empty and having a nifty ‘trigger’ mechanism which stays on till released.</p> <p>It’s battery powered which means you can whizz about the house to your hearts content, making light work of carpets, hard floors and tiles, and easily gets to those hard to reach areas with the long reach cleaning wand. Oh and we love the vibrant shade of purple.</p> <h2><strong>Vax UCPMSHV1 Air Lift Steerable Max Lift Away Bagless Upright Vacuum Cleaner</strong></h2> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="vax-pink" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20211020124309/ebay-best-vacuum-cleaners/0-600-270/vax-pink-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Vax Air Lift Steerable Lift Away, £69.99, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F362639194388%3Fmkcid%3D1%26mkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26siteid%3D3%26campid%3D5338841865%26toolid%3D20008%26mkevt%3D1" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="ebay">eBay</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F362639194388%3Fmkcid%3D1%26mkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26siteid%3D3%26campid%3D5338841865%26toolid%3D20008%26mkevt%3D1" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="ebay pink"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Not to be outdone on the bright colours, the Vax Air Lift is a lovely shade of pink – and it has an impressive 4.8 out of five rating.</p> <p>This is a powerful, multi-cyclonic lift out vacuum cleaner, which the brand says has the best pick up performance from any lift out vacuum cleaner in the UK. One very satisfied buyer writes: "My wife having prised it out of my hands and hoovering the bedroom admitted it was one of my few good ideas to purchase this vacuum. What makes it even better is the price we paid. Being refurbished, it’s basically brand new without the original box - it was a massive saving."</p> <h2><strong>Vax VRS26 Powermax Multifunction 7-in-1 Upright Steam Mop Stick Cleaner</strong></h2> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="ebay-mop" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20211020124309/ebay-best-vacuum-cleaners/0-600-271/ebay-mop-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong> Vax Powermax steam mop, £33.87, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F143238433288%3Fmkcid%3D1%26mkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26siteid%3D3%26campid%3D5338841865%26toolid%3D20008%26mkevt%3D1" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="mop cleaner">eBay</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F143238433288%3Fmkcid%3D1%26mkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26siteid%3D3%26campid%3D5338841865%26toolid%3D20008%26mkevt%3D1" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="mop cleaner"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Okay so it’s not strictly speaking a vacuum – but this fab steam mop deserves a place on this list. Over 1000 have been sold so far and it’s easy to see why - it has a heat time of 30 seconds and a steaming time of 15 minutes.</p> <p>It’s a 7-in-1 steam mob which can throurghouly clean floor surfaces such as marble, ceramic, stone, linoleum, sealed hardwood floors, parquet floors and carpet, without so much as breaking a sweat.</p> <p><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/homes/20210930122925/ebay-hacks-for-homeware/" target="_blank" rel="">7 eBay hacks for shopping luxe homeware for less</a></strong></p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!'s selection is editorial and independently chosen – we only feature items our editors love and approve of. HELLO! may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/" target="_blank" rel="">FAQ page</a>.</p> </body></html>

item.title: Can't sleep during a full moon? Here’s why, plus 4 genius ways to ensure you do
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p>A full moon affecting <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/sleep/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>sleep</strong></a> is a legit thing and October's full moon is, unfortunately, no exception. It's called 'lunar insomnia', and there are various scientific and environmental factors that come into play.</p> <p><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/2020040387429/how-to-fall-asleep-quickly/" target="_blank" rel="">20 best things to help you sleep: The tips, tricks & products you need to try</a></strong></p> <p>Ahead of the Full Hunter's Moon on 20 October, sleep experts at <strong><a href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.mattressnextday.co.uk%2F" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">MattressNextDay</a> </strong>teamed up with astrologer Inbaal Honigman to explain how the full moon can mess with your sleep, and what we can do to make sure we get a good night's kip.</p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="XElNlQ3p" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/XElNlQ3p-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: How to get a good night's sleep</strong></p> <h2>How the full moon might affect sleep</h2> <h3>1. You may struggle to fall asleep</h3> <p>Inbaal claims this comes down to the rise and fall of water, which disturbs our ability to doze off: "The moon controls the tides, pulling water towards the shore and releasing it back again. The average body is made up of 70% water. If the moon can move whole oceans, imagine the effect it has on our bodies when trying to relax."</p> <p><strong>SEE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20210916121820/meghan-markle-duchess-of-sussex-health-sleep/" target="_blank" rel="">Meghan Markle’s secrets to falling asleep faster (and staying asleep) revealed</a></strong></p> <p>Sleep scientists in Switzerland also confirmed that we struggle to nod off during a full moon with their own <a href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23891110/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><strong>findings</strong></a>, whereby on the night of a full moon, it took the average person an extra five minutes to fall asleep.</p> <h3>2. You may get less sleep on the whole</h3> <p>The same scientists in Switzerland found that the average person gets 20 minutes less kip on the night of a full moon. Why? They also found that on the days leading up to the full moon, both men and women had lower levels of melatonin, the hormone essential for regulating our sleep-wake cycle. So it makes sense that we might not catch as many Zs.</p> <p><strong>RELATED: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/2019010866354/wellness-apps-to-download/" target="_blank" rel="">18 of the best wellness apps of 2021</a></strong></p> <h3>3. You may spend less time in deep sleep</h3> <p>Find that you wake up feeling groggier than usual the morning after a full moon? Even if you managed to nod off straight away? There's a reason: <a href="https://www.livescience.com/38435-full-moon-affects-sleep.html" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><strong>another study</strong></a> found that during a full moon, brain activity related to deep sleep dropped by 30 per cent, which is when the real recuperation happens.</p> <h2>How to prevent a bad night sleep during a Full Moon</h2> <h3>1. Minimise light exposure</h3> <p>The experts at MattressNextDay and astrologer Inbaal say that history suggests it was initially the light of the full moon that kept people awake, which makes sense since light is what regulates the body's circadian rhythm – your sleep-wake cycle. The later we expose ourselves to light, the harder it will be to drop off, so gradually start to dim and limit your lighting as bedtime comes around.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="blue-light-glasses" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20211019124288/full-moon-affecting-sleep-tips/0-600-161/blue-light-glasses-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Okany blue light blocking glasses three-pack, </strong><strong>£14.99, <a href="https://geni.us/blue-light-glass" rel="nofollow nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="blue light glasses">Amazon</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://geni.us/blue-light-glass" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="blue light glasses">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <h3>2. Avoid using your phone for three hours before bed</h3> <p>"The blue light emitted by your phone can trick your mind into thinking that it's daytime despite it being dark outside," say the experts. They recommend using night mode on your phone if you really can't go without using it, but in an ideal world, you'd avoid using your phone for this time altogether.</p> <h3>3. Plan a relaxing night</h3> <p>The more you anticipate a bad night's sleep, the more likely it is to happen, since your body will produce more of the stress hormone, cortisol, which keeps you awake at night. Make your afternoon as relaxing as possible, with "anything from yoga to stretching, meditating to deep breathing, journaling or having a hot bath".</p> <h3>4. Play rain sounds at night</h3> <p>According to the experts, "steady rainfall noises have been proven to help lure the brain into falling asleep". The predictable, calming, stable and non-threatening nature of the sounds help "induce a meditative state that brings on relaxation".</p> <p><strong>READ: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/20210507112651/best-wellness-podcasts/" target="_blank" rel="">The top 9 wellness podcasts to nourish your mind, body and soul</a></strong></p> <h2><span style="background-color:initial">What is the Hunter's Moon?</span></h2> <p>Astrologer Inbaal says, "The full moon in October is known as the Hunter's Moon. In September, the animals were too skinny for the Native hunters and by November, the cold may have got them. So, the hunting begins in October, by the light of the full moon which made it easier to spy on their prey."</p> <h2>When is the next Full Moon?</h2> <p>The Hunter's Moon will peak at 3:55pm on 20 October 2021, for UK residents.</p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!'s selection is editorial and independently chosen – we only feature items our editors love and approve of. HELLO! may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/" target="_blank" rel="">FAQ page</a>.</p> <p><em><strong>Like this story?<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/newsletter/?utm_source=article&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=newsletter-signup" target="_blank" rel=""> Sign up to our newsletter</a> to get other stories like this delivered straight to your inbox.</strong></em></p> </body></html>
item.dc:creator: Bridie Wilkins

item.title: Kate Middleton stuns in the boldest pleated skirt at charity event

rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="demellier handbag"><strong>DeMellier</strong></a>. </p> <p>The brunette beauty wore her signature long hair in a voluminous curled style and sported a item.title: Experts share how the menopause can affect your skin - and the products to try
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html><body><p>Menopausal <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/skin-care/" target="_blank" rel=""><stro ng>skin</strong></a>. How much do you know about it? As the conversation around the <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/menopause/" target="_blank" rel=""><strong>menopause</strong></a> has finally opened up – rather than being shrouded in secrecy and referred to only as ‘the change’ – one thing more and more women are talking about is the effects of the menopause on their skin.</p> <p>We asked the skincare experts at <a href="https://www.farmologie.co.uk/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><strong>Farmologie by Childs Farm</strong></a>, whose range of body care products are formulated to alleviate the needs of hormonally changing skin experienced throughout peri-menopause and menopause, to explain more...</p> <h2><strong>Why does the menopause affect skin?</strong></h2> <p>Along with night sweats, brain fog and hot flushes, changes to the skin begin to occur during peri-menopause, when oestrogen levels start to reduce.</p> <p><strong>"A consequence of becoming peri-menopausal is accelerated dehydration of our skin. The reduction of oestrogen reduces collagen production affecting the skin's elasticity, meaning it can look thinner and lines more visible,"</strong> explains Farmologie’s skincare expert.Childs Farm and Farmologie Founder, Joanna Jensen.</p> <p>"At the same time, from our mid-thirties, our skin's lipid production slows down meaning there is less skin barrier protection, so the top layer of our skin dries out more quickly."</p> <h2><strong>How the menopause affects skin</strong></h2> <p>As hormone levels plummet, the reduction of collagen in the skin and hair has a major effect on your skin and body.</p> <p>Dry skin is just one menopause skin complaint. As there’s less collagen, the reduction of elasticity can mean skin will sag – so lines and wrinkles can appear more prominent. And with erratic oestrogen production, skin can become more red, itchy with hot flushes and more sensitive to creams, washing powders and washes too.</p> <h2><strong>How to care for skin during the menopause</strong></h2> <p>Moisturising all of your body twice daily should become the norm during menopause to compensate the collagen depletion, so look for moisturising products to help alleviate the dryness caused by the menopause.</p> <p>"Our skin is a protective barrier to prevent irritation and infection occuring. Skin lipids and collagen normally maintain this barrier so as they deplete , it is important to use moisturising products with actives that will bind skin cells together to prevent the driness which allows damage to occur," says Joanna.</p> <p>So which products should you be reaching for? Here are five of the best from Farmologie...</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="moro-moist" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/s/20211019124013/farmologie-experts-menopause-skincare-advice/0-598-927/moro-moist-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Moro orange body moisturiser, £3.49, <a href="https://www.farmologie.co.uk/products/farmologie-moro-orange-moisturiser" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">Farmologie by Childs Farm</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://www.farmologie.co.uk/products/farmologie-moro-orange-moisturiser" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>A Ceramide rich moisturiser which is dermatologist approved to lock-in moisture, and instantly soothe and hydrate dry, sensitive and ‘menopausing’ skin.</p> <p>Used daily, skin will look vital and healthy. Colloidal Beta Glucan binds moisture to the skin, Avenanthramides from Finnish Oats reduce irritation and redness, and Oat Lipids rich in AntioxidantsVitamin E and Linoleic Acid combine with Shea butter to form a protective barrier on the skin to keep it hydrated.</p> <p>This uplifting fragrance includes essential oil from the peel of the ruby-red moro orange, a sustainable by-product of the juicing industry.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="farmologie-pink-bath" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/s/20211019124013/farmologie-experts-menopause-skincare-advice/0-598-923/farmologie-pink-bath-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Pink grapefruit body wash 250ml, £5.99, <a href="https://www.farmologie.co.uk/products/farmologie-pink-grapefruit-body-wash" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">Farmologie by Childs Farm</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://www.farmologie.co.uk/products/farmologie-pink-grapefruit-body-wash" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank" title="farm"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Start treating your skin the minute you step into the shower with Farmologie's Body Wash. Using naturally derived surfactants from sugar beet and coconut, it’s a rich, luxurious product which cleanses and gently removes impurities, whilst hydrating and moisturising dry, sensitive skin and menopausing skin.</p> <p>Actives include Oat Ceramides and Oat Lipids to reduce redness and irritation, whilst Antioxidants Vitamin E and Linoleic Acid form a protective barrier on the skin to keep it hydrated. Gorgeous.</p> <p>Citrus fragrance includes pink grapefruit essential oil to awaken mind and spirit and give you a refreshing lift.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="farmologie-body-oil" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/s/20211019124013/farmologie-experts-menopause-skincare-advice/0-598-914/farmologie-body-oil-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Body Oil, £7.99, <a href="https://www.farmologie.co.uk/products/farmologie-coconut-body-oil" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">Farmologie by Childs Farm</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://www.farmologie.co.uk/products/farmologie-coconut-body-oil" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Alleviate dry, itchy skin post-shower with this body oil packed with some of the best moisturising ingredients; there’s oil from Ghanaian baobab seeds, organic coconut oil and Italian grape seed and olive oil combined to deliver a quickly absorbing light oil to moisturise your body to the max.</p> <p>Natural coconut oil gives it a deliciously tropical scent too.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="farmologie-bath-soak" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/s/20211019124013/farmologie-experts-menopause-skincare-advice/0-598-913/farmologie-bath-soak-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Moro Orange Bath Soak, £5.99, <a href="https://www.farmologie.co.uk/products/farmologie-moro-orange-bath-soak" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">Farmologie by Childs Farm</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://www.farmologie.co.uk/products/farmologie-moro-orange-bath-soak" rel="nofollow sponsored" target="_blank"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>A good soak in the tub is our favourite form of self-care – get the candles lit, the wine on the go and immerse yourself in this deliciously-scented bath soak, using the essential oil from the peel of a ruby-red Moro orange (a sustainable by-product of the juicing industry).</p> <p>Along with the uplifting fragrance, this bath soak is packed with moisturising ingredients, from Oat Ceramides and Oat Lipids to reduce redness and irritation, and Antioxidants Vitamin E and Linoleic Acid which help form a protective barrier on the skin to keep it hydrated.</p> <p> <span class="photo"> <span class="copyright" data-copy=""></span> <meta itemprop="width" content="auto"> <meta itemprop="height" content="auto"> </span> </p><img alt="farmologie-handcream" itemprop="image" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/s/20211019124013/farmologie-experts-menopause-skincare-advice/0-598-917/farmologie-handcream-z.jpg"> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Pink Grapefruit Hand Cream, £4.99, <a href="https://www.farmologie.co.uk/products/farmologie-pink-grapefruit-hand-cream" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">Farmologie by
